channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As ceasefire talks stall, Israel's government weighs a full occupation of Gaza
item.description: Just days after the U.S. Middle East envoy, Steve Witkoff, visited Israel and met with hostages' families, the Israeli government considers a full occ...

item.title: This Tuscan startup sold all its olive oil in the U.S. Then came Trump's tariffs
item.description: Americans love olive oil — and import 95% of it. But tariffs are making it harder for Europeans to sell it to Americans.

item.title: Hurricane Katrina was a catalyst for change in New Orleans' public defender office
item.description: Hurricane Katrina exposed longstanding flaws in the New Orleans criminal justice system. In the 20 years since, there has been dramatic change in the ...

item.title: He said, she said, it said: I used ChatGPT as a couple's counselor. How did we fare?
item.description: Looking for backup, I turned to an AI chatbot for relationship wisdom. It took my side. It was only when I challenged the bot's biases — and my own — ...

item.title: 8/4: The Daily Report
item.description: Nancy Chen reports on the ongoing redistricting fight in Texas, the fallout over the firing of the Labor of Bureau Statistics commissioner, and more.

item.title: Dozens feared trapped after cloudburst triggers flash floods in India state
item.description: Rescue teams are en route to Dharali village in Uttarkashi district, which is believed to have borne the brunt of the floods.

item.title: 8/4: CBS Evening News
item.description: Democratic lawmakers who fled Texas speak out after being threatened with arrest; Number of butterflies decreasing across U.S.

item.title: No reward in Trump's law for states that rejected Obama's Medicaid expansion

item.title: Texas and California joust for political advantage, with Trump power and US House majority in play
item.description: Texas Democrats prevented their state’s House of Representatives from moving forward, at least for now, with a redrawn congressional map sought by Pre...

item.title: Texas Republicans vote to arrest Democrats blocking plan to re-draw electoral boundaries
item.description: The Democrats facing arrest have fled to block a vote that could sway the balance of power in Washington.

item.title: 3 linked to suspect arrested in Tenn. killings of abandoned infant's relatives
item.description: Tennessee investigators allege Dearrah Sanders, Tanaka Brown and Giovonte Thomas "assisted" Austin Robert Drummond, who is wanted in the murders.

item.title: Tennessee readies for execution of man with working implanted defibrillator

item.description: Launch barges at a fireworks festival in Japan's city Yokohama caught fire after pyrotechnics landed on them.

item.title: Protests in China over viral school bullying case
item.description: One protester in Sichuan province said “things got bloody” after police used batons and electric prods.

item.title: How a dispute over new Texas congressional maps highlights the nation’s history of gerrymandering
